title: Computer Blue Screens when Installing league, has never happened before?
body:
It's only when league of legends is installing, and updating the client specifically.

I'm not sure what the main cause of this is, but i've never had any problem with this computer before playing league of legends. Help is appreciated.

replies.body: Yikes, blue screens are mostly a sign that something is going rather wrong with your pc itself and might not be related to League whatsoever. Let's go ahead and get you a little more in-depth help from our tech guys to make sure we cover all of our bases while trying to troubleshoot this. Hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and you'll be in good hands.
